channel.title: 2017-02-21 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-02-21 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 21 Feb 2017 00:00
item.description: A mile on the roads in the morning. Stretches of sidewalks still icy. Decided to head back home. Clocked 8 on the treadmill later in the evening at the Y right after work. Miss Me ended up rowing for sometime, after quite sometime!
item.content:encoded: A mile on the roads in the morning. Stretches of sidewalks still icy. Decided to head back home. Clocked 8 on the treadmill later in the evening at the Y right after work. Miss Me ended up rowing for sometime, after quite sometime!
